content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251752,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかゼス軍が騒がしい、そわそわしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow the Zeth army is noisy and restless."},{"lineNumber":251753,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かと聞くと・・正午、放送局を占領したメディウサにより魔法ビジョンで放送がある","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked what it was... at noon, Medusa, who occupied the broadcasting station, will broadcast on Magic Vision."},{"lineNumber":251754,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつも誰かが惨殺されるシーンばかりで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It's always scenes of someone being massacred..."},{"lineNumber":251755,"originalJapaneseLine":"みなければいいのに・・＞わかっていても見てましう、知り合いが捕まってないかとか気になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They shouldn’t watch it... but even if they know, they still watch it, worried if someone they know got caught."},{"lineNumber":251756,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、見ようとランスは決める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, Rance decides to watch."},{"lineNumber":251757,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの者と一緒に見る・・放送が始まった","translatedEnglishLine":"He watches together with the Zeth soldiers... The broadcast began."},{"lineNumber":251758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　衝撃、ガンジー、ウィチタ、カオルが殺されていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Shocking, Gandhi, Wichita, and Kaoru were killed."},{"lineNumber":251759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てへ、国王ガンジー捕まえたの、３日ほどかけて連続放送でみんなに見せて","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, I captured King Gandhi, and planned to show everyone through a continuous broadcast over about three days."},{"lineNumber":251760,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あげよと思ったけど、あまりにも生意気だからついもう殺しちゃった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I intended to, but he was so cheeky I ended up killing him already."},{"lineNumber":251761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日のターゲットはＸＸＸＸ（毛利きくが当てはまる感じ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Tomorrow’s target is XXXX (someone like Mouri Kiku)."},{"lineNumber":251762,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス兵はみんなショック、ランスも怒る","translatedEnglishLine":"All the Zeth soldiers are shocked; Rance is angry too."},{"lineNumber":251763,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが心配する、これ・・マジックさんが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone worries, this... Magic-san is..."},{"lineNumber":251764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251765,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、ゼス王宮","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the Zeth royal palace."},{"lineNumber":251766,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックの悲鳴・・・どの程度、あわてさせるかは任せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic’s scream... How much panic to cause is up to you."},{"lineNumber":251767,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロピチャあたりがフォロー役","translatedEnglishLine":"Erotic Picha is playing the role of support."},{"lineNumber":251768,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子は泣きわめきはしないが真っ白になっているかな（王大好きさんだし）","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko doesn’t cry or scream, but is probably stunned white (since she loves the king)."},{ "lineNumber":251769,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都に向かって移動中、サテラがメディウサについて説明する","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the capital, Satella explains about Medusa."},{"lineNumber":251770,"originalJapaneseLine":"合った事がある、とか、何かエピソードを交えながら","translatedEnglishLine":"She talks about having met her or shares some episode."},{"lineNumber":251771,"originalJapaneseLine":"いかに危険で危ない奴かを語る","translatedEnglishLine":"She describes how dangerous and deadly she is."},{"lineNumber":251772,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレフガルドについてもここで説明、彼が掠っている","translatedEnglishLine":"She also explains about Alefgard here; he is hovering around."},{"lineNumber":251773,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから誰も逃げる事が出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, no one can escape."},{"lineNumber":251774,"originalJapaneseLine":"（設定見て、うまく作って下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Refer to settings and create it well.)"},{"lineNumber":251775,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、西部方面の前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the western front."},{"lineNumber":251776,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と対峙しているＪＡＰＡＮからの援軍部隊＋ゼス軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Reinforcements from JAPAN plus Zeth army are confronting the demon army."},{"lineNumber":251777,"originalJapaneseLine":"きくがゼス隊長と共に戦っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Kiku is fighting alongside the Zeth commander."},{"lineNumber":251778,"originalJapaneseLine":"王様が殺されたからって、みんな動揺しすぎだ、こんな時こそ","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is too shaken because the king was killed, but at times like this,"},{"lineNumber":251779,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふんばらないといけないのにとはっぱかけている","translatedEnglishLine":"We must hold firm, he urges them on."},{"lineNumber":251780,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス側の隊長が申し訳無い、助かりますと","translatedEnglishLine":"The Zeth commander apologizes and says \"Thank you for saving us.\""},{"lineNumber":251781,"originalJapaneseLine":"ですが、きく様は後方に下がって頂きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"However, we would like Lady Kiku to fall back to the rear."},{"lineNumber":251782,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの放送を見られたでしょ、魔人メディウサが示した次のターゲット","translatedEnglishLine":"You saw that broadcast, right? The demon Medusa showed the next target."},{"lineNumber":251783,"originalJapaneseLine":"その・・きく様に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That... is Lady Kiku..."},{"lineNumber":251784,"originalJapaneseLine":"びびってねぇよ、だいたい、この戦場で今も数百人が死んでいるんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not scared. After all, hundreds are still dying on this battlefield."},{"lineNumber":251785,"originalJapaneseLine":"今更、命惜しんでどうする、確率でいえば今戦場で死ぬ方が高いんだし","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, why value life? The odds say you're more likely to die on this battlefield now."},{"lineNumber":251786,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、それは・・そうですが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, yes... that's true, but..."},{"lineNumber":251787,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、押され出したな・・ちょっくらここまかす、私は前線で敵の大将を","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, we’re being pushed back... I'll leave this here for a moment. I'm going to assassinate the enemy general at the front line."},{"lineNumber":251788,"originalJapaneseLine":"暗殺してくるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll go and assassinate him."},{"lineNumber":251789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きくさん　かっこよく","translatedEnglishLine":"Kiku, looking cool."},{"lineNumber":251790,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、前線から遠く離れた小さな村","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, in a small village far from the front line."},{"lineNumber":251791,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下室に隠れている娘がいた。ゼス魔法軍兵士のＸＸＸＸ。ＬＶ３０中堅","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a girl hiding in a basement. Zeth Magic Army soldier XXXX, mid-level LV30."},{"lineNumber":251792,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女は毛利きくと同じくメディウサに名指しされた特徴を持つ女","translatedEnglishLine":"She is a woman who, like Mouri Kiku, has traits that caused Medusa to single her out."},{"lineNumber":251793,"originalJapaneseLine":"怯えている、友達と隠れている","translatedEnglishLine":"She is scared and hiding with friends."},{"lineNumber":251794,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫よ、ここは前線と離れているし、魔軍は近くにはいないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s okay, this place is far from the front line, and the demon army isn’t near."},{"lineNumber":251795,"originalJapaneseLine":"同じような特徴の女の子なんて何百人もいるし・・ねっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are hundreds of girls with similar features... see?"},{"lineNumber":251796,"originalJapaneseLine":"私、いやだ・・あんな風に殺され、それを放送されるなんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t want to... being killed like that, and having it broadcast..."},{"lineNumber":251797,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに友達がみんな守ってくれている、この建物も２０名もの有志が守っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, my friends are all protecting me, and this building is guarded by as many as twenty volunteers."},{"lineNumber":251798,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫だよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s going to be okay..."},{"lineNumber":251799,"originalJapaneseLine":"が・・アレフガルド登場、紳士です。","translatedEnglishLine":"But... Alefgard appears, a gentleman."},{"lineNumber":251800,"originalJapaneseLine":"女の子はいやーーー　捕まるくらいなら私死ぬーと自殺しようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"The girl shouts, \"Nooo— if I’m going to be caught, I’d rather die!\" and tries to commit suicide,"},{"lineNumber":251801,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレフガルドにさっそうと止められる。","translatedEnglishLine":"but Alefgard dashingly stops her."},{"lineNumber":251802,"originalJapaneseLine":"お嬢様へのプレゼントですよ、傷つける訳にはいけません","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a gift for you, my lady. I must not hurt you."},{"lineNumber":251803,"originalJapaneseLine":"掠っていきます","translatedEnglishLine":"I will steal/take her away."},{"lineNumber":251804,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネタ未定","translatedEnglishLine":"Content undecided."},{"lineNumber":251805,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か中ボス","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of mid-boss."},{"lineNumber":251806,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス首都に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Zeth capital."},{"lineNumber":251807,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックの事が心配で急いで向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurrying there, worried about Magic."},{"lineNumber":251808,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic, Urza, and Chizuruko."},{"lineNumber":251809,"originalJapaneseLine":"（カバッハーン、エロピチャなども出してもいいです）","translatedEnglishLine":"(You can also include Kabahaan, Eropicha, and others.)"},{"lineNumber":251810,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子は真っ白な廃人","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko is a pure white wreck."},{"lineNumber":251811,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、マジックは比較的落ち着いている感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"But Magic seems relatively calm."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかゼス軍が騒がしい、そわそわしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow the Zeth army is noisy and restless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かと聞くと・・正午、放送局を占領したメディウサにより魔法ビジョンで放送がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked what it was... at noon, Medusa, who occupied the broadcasting station, will broadcast on Magic Vision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも誰かが惨殺されるシーンばかりで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's always scenes of someone being massacred...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みなければいいのに・・＞わかっていても見てましう、知り合いが捕まってないかとか気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They shouldn’t watch it... but even if they know, they still watch it, worried if someone they know got caught.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、見ようとランスは決める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance decides to watch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの者と一緒に見る・・放送が始まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He watches together with the Zeth soldiers... The broadcast began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃、ガンジー、ウィチタ、カオルが殺されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shocking, Gandhi, Wichita, and Kaoru were killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てへ、国王ガンジー捕まえたの、３日ほどかけて連続放送でみんなに見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I captured King Gandhi, and planned to show everyone through a continuous broadcast over about three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あげよと思ったけど、あまりにも生意気だからついもう殺しちゃった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intended to, but he was so cheeky I ended up killing him already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日のターゲットはＸＸＸＸ（毛利きくが当てはまる感じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow’s target is XXXX (someone like Mouri Kiku).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス兵はみんなショック、ランスも怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the Zeth soldiers are shocked; Rance is angry too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが心配する、これ・・マジックさんが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone worries, this... Magic-san is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ゼス王宮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the Zeth royal palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの悲鳴・・・どの程度、あわてさせるかは任せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic’s scream... How much panic to cause is up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャあたりがフォロー役
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Erotic Picha is playing the role of support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子は泣きわめきはしないが真っ白になっているかな（王大好きさんだし）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko doesn’t cry or scream, but is probably stunned white (since she loves the king).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都に向かって移動中、サテラがメディウサについて説明する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the capital, Satella explains about Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 合った事がある、とか、何かエピソードを交えながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She talks about having met her or shares some episode.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかに危険で危ない奴かを語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She describes how dangerous and deadly she is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドについてもここで説明、彼が掠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She also explains about Alefgard here; he is hovering around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから誰も逃げる事が出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, no one can escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （設定見て、うまく作って下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Refer to settings and create it well.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、西部方面の前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the western front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と対峙しているＪＡＰＡＮからの援軍部隊＋ゼス軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reinforcements from JAPAN plus Zeth army are confronting the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくがゼス隊長と共に戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku is fighting alongside the Zeth commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王様が殺されたからって、みんな動揺しすぎだ、こんな時こそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is too shaken because the king was killed, but at times like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふんばらないといけないのにとはっぱかけている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must hold firm, he urges them on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス側の隊長が申し訳無い、助かりますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth commander apologizes and says "Thank you for saving us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、きく様は後方に下がって頂きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we would like Lady Kiku to fall back to the rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの放送を見られたでしょ、魔人メディウサが示した次のターゲット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You saw that broadcast, right? The demon Medusa showed the next target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その・・きく様に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That... is Lady Kiku...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びびってねぇよ、だいたい、この戦場で今も数百人が死んでいるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not scared. After all, hundreds are still dying on this battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更、命惜しんでどうする、確率でいえば今戦場で死ぬ方が高いんだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, why value life? The odds say you're more likely to die on this battlefield now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それは・・そうですが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, yes... that's true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、押され出したな・・ちょっくらここまかす、私は前線で敵の大将を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, we’re being pushed back... I'll leave this here for a moment. I'm going to assassinate the enemy general at the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗殺してくるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go and assassinate him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくさん　かっこよく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku, looking cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線から遠く離れた小さな村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in a small village far from the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室に隠れている娘がいた。ゼス魔法軍兵士のＸＸＸＸ。ＬＶ３０中堅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a girl hiding in a basement. Zeth Magic Army soldier XXXX, mid-level LV30.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は毛利きくと同じくメディウサに名指しされた特徴を持つ女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is a woman who, like Mouri Kiku, has traits that caused Medusa to single her out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怯えている、友達と隠れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is scared and hiding with friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫よ、ここは前線と離れているし、魔軍は近くにはいないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s okay, this place is far from the front line, and the demon army isn’t near.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じような特徴の女の子なんて何百人もいるし・・ねっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are hundreds of girls with similar features... see?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いやだ・・あんな風に殺され、それを放送されるなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t want to... being killed like that, and having it broadcast...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに友達がみんな守ってくれている、この建物も２０名もの有志が守っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, my friends are all protecting me, and this building is guarded by as many as twenty volunteers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s going to be okay...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・アレフガルド登場、紳士です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... Alefgard appears, a gentleman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子はいやーーー　捕まるくらいなら私死ぬーと自殺しようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl shouts, "Nooo— if I’m going to be caught, I’d rather die!" and tries to commit suicide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドにさっそうと止められる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Alefgard dashingly stops her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お嬢様へのプレゼントですよ、傷つける訳にはいけません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a gift for you, my lady. I must not hurt you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 掠っていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will steal/take her away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Content undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か中ボス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of mid-boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Zeth capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの事が心配で急いで向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurrying there, worried about Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic, Urza, and Chizuruko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （カバッハーン、エロピチャなども出してもいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (You can also include Kabahaan, Eropicha, and others.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子は真っ白な廃人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko is a pure white wreck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、マジックは比較的落ち着いている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Magic seems relatively calm.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

How much panic to cause is up to you."},{"lineNumber":251767,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロピチャあたりがフォロー役","translatedEnglishLine":"Erotic Picha is playing the role of support."},{"lineNumber":251768,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子は泣きわめきはしないが真っ白になっているかな（王大好きさんだし）","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko doesn’t cry or scream, but is probably stunned white (since she loves the king)."},{ "lineNumber":251769,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都に向かって移動中、サテラがメディウサについて説明する","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the capital, Satella explains about Medusa."},{"lineNumber":251770,"originalJapaneseLine":"合った事がある、とか、何かエピソードを交えながら","translatedEnglishLine":"She talks about having met her or shares some episode."},{"lineNumber":251771,"originalJapaneseLine":"いかに危険で危ない奴かを語る","translatedEnglishLine":"She describes how dangerous and deadly she is."},{"lineNumber":251772,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレフガルドについてもここで説明、彼が掠っている","translatedEnglishLine":"She also explains about Alefgard here; he is hovering around."},{"lineNumber":251773,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから誰も逃げる事が出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, no one can escape."},{"lineNumber":251774,"originalJapaneseLine":"（設定見て、うまく作って下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Refer to settings and create it well.)"},{"lineNumber":251775,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、西部方面の前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the western front."},{"lineNumber":251776,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と対峙しているＪＡＰＡＮからの援軍部隊＋ゼス軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Reinforcements from JAPAN plus Zeth army are confronting the demon army."},{"lineNumber":251777,"originalJapaneseLine":"きくがゼス隊長と共に戦っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Kiku is fighting alongside the Zeth commander."},{"lineNumber":251778,"originalJapaneseLine":"王様が殺されたからって、みんな動揺しすぎだ、こんな時こそ","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is too shaken because the king was killed, but at times like this,"},{"lineNumber":251779,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふんばらないといけないのにとはっぱかけている","translatedEnglishLine":"We must hold firm, he urges them on."},{"lineNumber":251780,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス側の隊長が申し訳無い、助かりますと","translatedEnglishLine":"The Zeth commander apologizes and says \"Thank you for saving us.\""},{"lineNumber":251781,"originalJapaneseLine":"ですが、きく様は後方に下がって頂きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"However, we would like Lady Kiku to fall back to the rear."},{"lineNumber":251782,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの放送を見られたでしょ、魔人メディウサが示した次のターゲット","translatedEnglishLine":"You saw that broadcast, right? The demon Medusa showed the next target."},{"lineNumber":251783,"originalJapaneseLine":"その・・きく様に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That... is Lady Kiku..."},{"lineNumber":251784,"originalJapaneseLine":"びびってねぇよ、だいたい、この戦場で今も数百人が死んでいるんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not scared. The odds say you're more likely to die on this battlefield now."},{"lineNumber":251786,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、それは・・そうですが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, yes... that's true, but..."},{"lineNumber":251787,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、押され出したな・・ちょっくらここまかす、私は前線で敵の大将を","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, we’re being pushed back... Zeth Magic Army soldier XXXX, mid-level LV30."},{"lineNumber":251792,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女は毛利きくと同じくメディウサに名指しされた特徴を持つ女","translatedEnglishLine":"She is a woman who, like Mouri Kiku, has traits that caused Medusa to single her out."},{"lineNumber":251793,"originalJapaneseLine":"怯えている、友達と隠れている","translatedEnglishLine":"She is scared and hiding with friends."},{"lineNumber":251794,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫よ、ここは前線と離れているし、魔軍は近くにはいないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s okay, this place is far from the front line, and the demon army isn’t near."},{"lineNumber":251795,"originalJapaneseLine":"同じような特徴の女の子なんて何百人もいるし・・ねっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are hundreds of girls with similar features... see?"},{"lineNumber":251796,"originalJapaneseLine":"私、いやだ・・あんな風に殺され、それを放送されるなんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t want to... being killed like that, and having it broadcast..."},{"lineNumber":251797,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに友達がみんな守ってくれている、この建物も２０名もの有志が守っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, my friends are all protecting me, and this building is guarded by as many as twenty volunteers."},{"lineNumber":251798,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫だよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s going to be okay..."},{"lineNumber":251799,"originalJapaneseLine":"が・・アレフガルド登場、紳士です。","translatedEnglishLine":"But... Alefgard appears, a gentleman."},{"lineNumber":251800,"originalJapaneseLine":"女の子はいやーーー　捕まるくらいなら私死ぬーと自殺しようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"The girl shouts, \"Nooo— if I’m going to be caught, I’d rather die!\" and tries to commit suicide,"},{"lineNumber":251801,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレフガルドにさっそうと止められる。","translatedEnglishLine":"but Alefgard dashingly stops her."},{"lineNumber":251802,"originalJapaneseLine":"お嬢様へのプレゼントですよ、傷つける訳にはいけません","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a gift for you, my lady. I must not hurt you."},{"lineNumber":251803,"originalJapaneseLine":"掠っていきます","translatedEnglishLine":"I will steal/take her away."},{"lineNumber":251804,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネタ未定","translatedEnglishLine":"Content undecided."},{"lineNumber":251805,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か中ボス","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of mid-boss."},{"lineNumber":251806,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス首都に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Zeth capital."},{"lineNumber":251807,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックの事が心配で急いで向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurrying there, worried about Magic."},{"lineNumber":251808,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic, Urza, and Chizuruko."},{"lineNumber":251809,"originalJapaneseLine":"（カバッハーン、エロピチャなども出してもいいです）","translatedEnglishLine":"(You can also include Kabahaan, Eropicha, and others.)"},{"lineNumber":251810,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子は真っ白な廃人","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko is a pure white wreck."},{"lineNumber":251811,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、マジックは比較的落ち着いている感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"But Magic seems relatively calm."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかゼス軍が騒がしい、そわそわしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow the Zeth army is noisy and restless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かと聞くと・・正午、放送局を占領したメディウサにより魔法ビジョンで放送がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked what it was... at noon, Medusa, who occupied the broadcasting station, will broadcast on Magic Vision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも誰かが惨殺されるシーンばかりで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's always scenes of someone being massacred...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みなければいいのに・・＞わかっていても見てましう、知り合いが捕まってないかとか気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They shouldn’t watch it... but even if they know, they still watch it, worried if someone they know got caught.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、見ようとランスは決める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance decides to watch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの者と一緒に見る・・放送が始まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He watches together with the Zeth soldiers... The broadcast began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃、ガンジー、ウィチタ、カオルが殺されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shocking, Gandhi, Wichita, and Kaoru were killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てへ、国王ガンジー捕まえたの、３日ほどかけて連続放送でみんなに見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I captured King Gandhi, and planned to show everyone through a continuous broadcast over about three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あげよと思ったけど、あまりにも生意気だからついもう殺しちゃった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intended to, but he was so cheeky I ended up killing him already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日のターゲットはＸＸＸＸ（毛利きくが当てはまる感じ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow’s target is XXXX (someone like Mouri Kiku).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス兵はみんなショック、ランスも怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the Zeth soldiers are shocked; Rance is angry too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが心配する、これ・・マジックさんが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone worries, this... Magic-san is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ゼス王宮
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the Zeth royal palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの悲鳴・・・どの程度、あわてさせるかは任せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic’s scream... How much panic to cause is up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャあたりがフォロー役
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Erotic Picha is playing the role of support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子は泣きわめきはしないが真っ白になっているかな（王大好きさんだし）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko doesn’t cry or scream, but is probably stunned white (since she loves the king).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都に向かって移動中、サテラがメディウサについて説明する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the capital, Satella explains about Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 合った事がある、とか、何かエピソードを交えながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She talks about having met her or shares some episode.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかに危険で危ない奴かを語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She describes how dangerous and deadly she is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドについてもここで説明、彼が掠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She also explains about Alefgard here; he is hovering around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから誰も逃げる事が出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, no one can escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （設定見て、うまく作って下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Refer to settings and create it well.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、西部方面の前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the western front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と対峙しているＪＡＰＡＮからの援軍部隊＋ゼス軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reinforcements from JAPAN plus Zeth army are confronting the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくがゼス隊長と共に戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku is fighting alongside the Zeth commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王様が殺されたからって、みんな動揺しすぎだ、こんな時こそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is too shaken because the king was killed, but at times like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふんばらないといけないのにとはっぱかけている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must hold firm, he urges them on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス側の隊長が申し訳無い、助かりますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth commander apologizes and says "Thank you for saving us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、きく様は後方に下がって頂きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we would like Lady Kiku to fall back to the rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの放送を見られたでしょ、魔人メディウサが示した次のターゲット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You saw that broadcast, right? The demon Medusa showed the next target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その・・きく様に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That... is Lady Kiku...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びびってねぇよ、だいたい、この戦場で今も数百人が死んでいるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not scared. After all, hundreds are still dying on this battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更、命惜しんでどうする、確率でいえば今戦場で死ぬ方が高いんだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, why value life? The odds say you're more likely to die on this battlefield now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それは・・そうですが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, yes... that's true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、押され出したな・・ちょっくらここまかす、私は前線で敵の大将を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, we’re being pushed back... I'll leave this here for a moment. I'm going to assassinate the enemy general at the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗殺してくるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go and assassinate him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくさん　かっこよく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku, looking cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線から遠く離れた小さな村
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in a small village far from the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室に隠れている娘がいた。ゼス魔法軍兵士のＸＸＸＸ。ＬＶ３０中堅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a girl hiding in a basement. Zeth Magic Army soldier XXXX, mid-level LV30.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は毛利きくと同じくメディウサに名指しされた特徴を持つ女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is a woman who, like Mouri Kiku, has traits that caused Medusa to single her out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怯えている、友達と隠れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is scared and hiding with friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫よ、ここは前線と離れているし、魔軍は近くにはいないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s okay, this place is far from the front line, and the demon army isn’t near.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じような特徴の女の子なんて何百人もいるし・・ねっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are hundreds of girls with similar features... see?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いやだ・・あんな風に殺され、それを放送されるなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t want to... being killed like that, and having it broadcast...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに友達がみんな守ってくれている、この建物も２０名もの有志が守っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, my friends are all protecting me, and this building is guarded by as many as twenty volunteers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s going to be okay...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・アレフガルド登場、紳士です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... Alefgard appears, a gentleman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子はいやーーー　捕まるくらいなら私死ぬーと自殺しようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl shouts, "Nooo— if I’m going to be caught, I’d rather die!" and tries to commit suicide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドにさっそうと止められる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Alefgard dashingly stops her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お嬢様へのプレゼントですよ、傷つける訳にはいけません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a gift for you, my lady. I must not hurt you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 掠っていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will steal/take her away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Content undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か中ボス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of mid-boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Zeth capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの事が心配で急いで向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurrying there, worried about Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic, Urza, and Chizuruko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （カバッハーン、エロピチャなども出してもいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (You can also include Kabahaan, Eropicha, and others.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子は真っ白な廃人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko is a pure white wreck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、マジックは比較的落ち着いている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Magic seems relatively calm.
